DOC.brief_summary: With this study the investigators would like to analyze the the role of periodontal disease and especially the role of Porphyromonas gingivalis in initiation and progression of Alzheimer`s Disease.
DOC.criteria: age 4070 caucasian origin dementia (Alzheimer`s or other dementia) cognitive healthy (need for spinal anesthesia) use of antibiotics within las 6 months pregnancy another illness explaining the symptoms in a better way smoking (>10 cigarettes) patients who have a legal custodian
